articles.title: India leads the way on Google’s Nano Banana with a local creative twist
articles.description: Indian users turning Google’s Nano Banana into a viral trend engine, from retro AI portraits to figurine-style selfies.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Meta launches Hyperscape, technology to turn real-world spaces into VR
articles.description: Meta launches Hyperscape into beta, allowing users to turn real world spaces into digital spaces for VR.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Meta unveils new smart glasses with a display and wristband controller
articles.description: Meta showed off its newest AI-powered smart glasses, which have a display and are controlled by a wristband, at Meta Connect 2025.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: Meta unveils its new Oakley Meta Vanguard smart glasses for athletes
articles.description: The new smart glasses are geared toward runners, cyclists, and other athletes.
articles.author: Aisha Malik
